title: Popularity of job search Web sites will cause ...

content.question: The recent popularity of job search Web sites that enable job seekers and potential employers to more efficiently contact each other is most likely to cause

choices.label: a reduction in the labor force participation rate
a reduction in structural, but not in frictional, unemployment rates
a reduction in the frictional unemployment rate
an increase in the overall unemployment rate
a reduction in cyclical, but not in frictional, unemployment rates

content.answer: a reduction in the frictional unemployment rate

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
